summary: When an old airport janitor finds a captain's hat in the trash, he gets pulled into the lives of children in his poor neighborhood. He weaves imaginary stories of his world adventures to offer hope in the face of their harsh reality.
cast: Nadim Sawalha|Rana Sultan|Hussein Al-Sous|Odai Qedese|Ghandi Saber|Dina Raad-Yaghnam|Mohammad Qteshat|Nadim Mushahwar|Faisal Majali|Lina Attel|Ali Maher|Khaled Al-Safi|Rami Samara|Ayat Najah Abd Al-Sadeq|Khuloud Khaled Issa|Salam Najjar|Bilal Rantisi|Issa Hilal|Marc Hollogne|Omar Jabaji|Malik Madi|Zeid Mustafa|Ala Husseini|Yousef Handileh|Moutassem Fahmawi|Phaedra Dahdaleh|Aida Matalqa|Nabil Koni|Simona Corno|Sana Lahham|Mohammad Fuqha|Lara Sawalha|Jad Hamati|Ramzi Matalqa|Musa Safari|Karma Fadel|Barbara Atalia|Fatima Adoum|Amr Ayed|Obadah Ayed|Ammar Daoud|Scott Jenkins|Mohammad Abu Qaoud|Ahmad Rashaideh|Fareed Yaghnam|Claire Naber|Fawaz Zoubi
keywords: character name as title|children|janitor|three word title|mistaken identity
title: Captain Abu Raed
